import React, { useState } from 'react' function Dish(props) { const { dish } = props; const [editDish, setEditDish] = useState(); const handleDishInput = () => event => { const key = event.target.name; const value = event.target.value; setDish({ ...dish, [key]: value }); } const addNewDish = () => { addDish(dish) .then((res) => { console.log(res) }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error) }) } return ( <> {dish.name} {dish.desc.slice(0, 10)}... {dish.category} {dish.subcategory} {dish.price} {dish.status} {/* */}
Add new dish
) } export default Dish
